channel.title: Making the server go online and hosting it
channel.description: so i downloaded some pk source and client. i just want to put it up for me and my friend to use, and all credits would go to him. i know it is leeching kinda but im not claiming it as mine and i just wanna play around, nothing is mine. but i cant choose the ip address and all on it, is there any way i could do that so me and my friend could play?

item.title: Making the server go online and hosting it
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman

so i downloaded some pk source and client. i just want to put it up for me and my friend to use, and all credits would go to him. i know it is leeching kinda but im not claiming it as mine and i just wanna play around, nothing is mine. but i cant choose the ip address and all on it, is there any way i could do that so me and my friend could play?
